author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: I Went to An Erotic Dinner Party and Ate Food off of Naked Strangers - LUST by Abby Hertz
text: As I sat on the floor atop a beaded cushion, delicately swirling a piece of bone-in quail over the nipple of mostly naked man, I felt profoundly awkward. Even with assurances from the woman next to me in a bra top and feather boa that my human dinner plate loved to be teased, I was unsure of how to interact with him. Do we ... chat? Is he hungry? Should I feed him too? I didnâ€™t quite feel emboldened by the organic, sensual experience promised at LUST , the "immersive erotic dinner party" I was attending. Despite building a career off of editing stories about places called " the Orgy Dome ," I'd never been to sex-themed party before. It was high time to change that.
